description: A React component that renders a checklist of recipe ingredients with local checkbox state management. It is a client-side component designed to allow users to mark ingredients as checked or unchecked, clear selections, and display ingredient details.

methods.name: IngredientsChecklist
methods.description: A React functional component that displays a list of ingredients with checkboxes, allowing users to mark items as checked or unchecked. Includes a button to clear all checks.
